testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/WOFF File Format
testcase.purpose: Valid CFF flavored WOFF with no metadata and no private data

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/WOFF File Format
testcase.purpose: Valid CFF flavored WOFF with metadata

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/WOFF File Format
testcase.purpose: The name table and metadata fields are out of sync. The name table contains FAIL and the metadata contains PASS for unique id, vendor name, vendor url, credit name, credit url, description, license, license url, copyright and trademark.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/WOFF File Format
testcase.purpose: The metadata is stored in an uncompressed state and therefore does not have the proper compression format.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/WOFF File Format
testcase.purpose: The xml encoding is set to UTF-8.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/WOFF File Format
testcase.purpose: The xml encoding is set to UTF-16.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/WOFF File Format
testcase.purpose: The xml encoding is set to ISO-8859-1.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/WOFF File Format
testcase.purpose: The metadata decompresses to a length that is 1 byte smaller than the length defined in metaOrigLength

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/WOFF File Format
testcase.purpose: The metadata decompresses to a length that is 1 byte greater than the length defined in metaOrigLength

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/WOFF File Format
testcase.purpose: The copyright element matches the schema. It contains one text element that does not have a language tag

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/WOFF File Format
testcase.purpose: The copyright element matches the schema. It contains one text element that has a language tag

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/WOFF File Format
testcase.purpose: The copyright element matches the schema. It contains one text element that has a language tag using the lang tag instead of xml:lang

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/WOFF File Format
testcase.purpose: The credit element matches the schema

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/WOFF File Format
testcase.purpose: The credit element does not contain a url attribute but it still matches the schema

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/WOFF File Format
testcase.purpose: The credit element does not contain a role attribute but it still matches the schema

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/WOFF File Format
testcase.purpose: The description element matches the schema

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/WOFF File Format
testcase.purpose: The description element does not contain a url attribute but it still matches the schema

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/WOFF File Format
testcase.purpose: The description element matches the schema. It contains one text element that does not have a language tag

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/WOFF File Format
testcase.purpose: The extension element matches the schema

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/WOFF File Format
testcase.purpose: Two extension elements match the schema

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/WOFF File Format
testcase.purpose: The extension element does not have an id attribute but it still matches the schema
